title: Titagarh Marine takes barge out through Sri Lanka
content: Submitted by Walter Jayawardhana The row between Kolkata-based Titagarh Marine, which owned the barge that crashed into the Pamban rail bridge and the Southern Railway after the latter denied permission for it to pass through the bridge without paying Rs. 1.5 crore compensation, took a dramatic turn with the company taking out the barge via…
